column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I recently used their catering service. The package was ok but I wished I knew earlier or thought of it that hot tapas are supposed to be hot...they are not that good cold. Cafe Ba-ba-Reba catered food but nothing else and did not suggest how to keep the food warm. So maybe it is me
column2: maybe it is them but my hot tapas were cold and I did not like.
